Desc: · Enemy Physical DMG taken <color=#4a70b9>+120%</color>.
SimpleEffectDesc: · Enemy takes more Physical DMG.

Desc: · Enemy Fire DMG taken <color=#4a70b9>+120%</color>.
SimpleEffectDesc: · Enemy takes more Fire DMG.

Desc: · Enemy Lightning DMG taken <color=#4a70b9>+120%</color>.
SimpleEffectDesc: · Enemy takes more Lightning DMG.

Desc: · Enemy Ice DMG taken <color=#4a70b9>+120%</color>.
SimpleEffectDesc: · Enemy takes more Ice DMG.

Desc: · Enemy Dark DMG taken <color=#4a70b9>+120%</color>.
SimpleEffectDesc: · Enemy takes more Dark DMG.

Desc: · Upon pinging an orb, additionally pings all Signal Orbs of the same color.\n· <color=#4a70b9>III</color> cooldown removed.
SimpleEffectDesc: · Upon pinging an orb, additionally pings all Signal Orbs of the same color.\n· <color=#4a70b9>III</color> cooldown removed.

Desc: · When casting Signature Move, has a <color=#4a70b9>50%</color> chance to restore <color=#4a70b9>100%</color> Energy consumed.
SimpleEffectDesc: · When casting Signature Move, has a chance to restore Energy consumed.

Desc: · [Wound] max stacking limit <color=#4a70b9>+20</color>\n· When a battle starts, inflicts <color=#4a70b9>20</color> stacks of [Wound] on all enemies.
SimpleEffectDesc: · [Wound] max stacking limit increases.\n· When a battle starts, inflicts copious stacks of [Wound] on all enemies.
TraitDesc: · Upon taking Basic Attack DMG, inflicts Elemental DMG equal to the Wound stack x<color=#4a70b9>200%</color> (same element as the bearer's), with a <color=#4a70b9>4</color>s cooldown.\n· Wound can stack up to <color=#4a70b9>20</color> times for <color=#4a70b9>10</color>s (refreshes when obtained repeatedly).

Desc: · <color=#4a70b9>II</color>'s stacking limit increases to <color=#4a70b9>360%</color>, and the duration of each stack is changed to <color=#4a70b9>999</color>s.\n· For every <color=#4a70b9>5%</color> excess CRIT Rate, grants <color=#4a70b9>5%</color> CRIT DMG.
SimpleEffectDesc: · Converts excess CRIT Rate to CRIT DMG in a certain ratio.\n· Enhances the effect of <color=#4a70b9>II</color>.

Desc: · <color=#4a70b9>I</color>: Processing Unit Drop Bonus increases to <color=#4a70b9>60%</color>.\n· <color=#4a70b9>II</color>: DMG Bonus increases to <color=#4a70b9>20%</color>.\n· <color=#4a70b9>III</color>: HP Bonus increases to <color=#4a70b9>5%</color>.
SimpleEffectDesc: · Significantly enhances the effects of <color=#4a70b9>I</color>, <color=#4a70b9>II</color>, and <color=#4a70b9>III</color>.

Desc:
· Every <color=#4a70b9>5</color>s, grants <color=#4a70b9>1</color> stack of the bonus effects of all parts of the set.
· <color=#4a70b9>I</color>: DMG Reduction limit increases to <color=#4a70b9>60%</color>.
· <color=#4a70b9>II</color>: Extra DMG Bonus increases to <color=#4a70b9>120%</color>.
· <color=#4a70b9>III</color>: The multiplier limit increases to <color=#4a70b9>2400%</color>.
SimpleEffectDesc: · Periodically grants bonus effects of all set parts.\n· Effect limits of all parts increases.

Desc: · For every <color=#b73a3a>1000</color> HP lost, Max HP <color=#4a70b9>+200</color>, up to <color=#4a70b9>20000</color>.
SimpleEffectDesc: · Increases Max HP upon HP loss.

Desc: · Healing DMG applies to all enemies on the field.\n· When there is only <color=#4a70b9>1</color> enemy, DMG <color=#4a70b9>+100%</color>.
SimpleEffectDesc: · Healing DMG applies to all enemies on the field.\n· DMG increases when the enemy count is scarce.

Desc: · When a battle ends, grants <color=#4a70b9>1</color> stack of [Execution] (permanently stackable within one run).\n· Grants <color=#4a70b9>4</color> stacks in a boss fight.
SimpleEffectDesc: · When clearing battle nodes, grants permanent stacks of [Execution] in one run.\n· Grants additional stacks in a boss fight.
TraitDesc: · Upon dealing damage, instantly executes an enemy if the target's HP Percentage is lower than the number of Execution stacks.

Desc: · Enemy [Poison] stack limit <color=#4a70b9>+30</color>.\n· When inflicting [Poison], grants <color=#4a70b9>1</color> additional stack.
SimpleEffectDesc: · Enemy [Poison] stack limit increases.\n· When inflicting [Poison], grants additional stacks.
TraitDesc: · When poisoned, receives True DMG equal to <color=#4a70b9>600%</color> of the bearer's ATK, stacking up to <color=#4a70b9>30</color> times for <color=#4a70b9>5</color>s (refreshes when obtained repeatedly, with each stack's DMG calculated independently).

Desc: · Upon dealing damage, all Elemental DMG taken by enemy <color=#4a70b9>+100%</color> for <color=#4a70b9>8</color>s.
SimpleEffectDesc: · Upon dealing damage, increases all Elemental DMG taken by enemy for a certain duration.

Desc: · Upon healing, the target's ATK <color=#4a70b9>+150%</color> for 8s.
SimpleEffectDesc: · Upon healing, significantly increases the target's ATK for a certain duration.

Desc: · The next deployed character gains the effects of all set parts (set effect not applied).\n· Enhances the effect of <color=#4a70b9>II</color> to <color=#4a70b9>200%</color>.
SimpleEffectDesc: · The next deployed character gains the effects of all set parts (set effect not applied).\n· Enhances the effect of <color=#4a70b9>II</color>.

Desc: · Upon entering the field, resets standby characters' switch cooldown.
SimpleEffectDesc: · Upon entering the field, resets standby characters' switch cooldown.

Desc: · Increases <color=#4a70b9>I</color>'s and <color=#4a70b9>II</color>'s bonus percentage to <color=#4a70b9>100%</color>.\n· When a character on the field takes lethal damage, the bearer <color=#b73a3a>dies</color> instead, grants characters on the field immunity to all damage for <color=#4a70b9>2</color>s, and restores <color=#4a70b9>100%</color> HP for them.
SimpleEffectDesc: · Increases <color=#4a70b9>I</color>'s and <color=#4a70b9>II</color>'s bonus percentage.\n· When a character on the field takes lethal damage, the bearer dies instead and restores HP for them.

Desc: · When there is no identical class in the team, grants bonus effects of all set parts <color=#4a70b9>1</color> time.
SimpleEffectDesc: · When there is no identical class in the team, grants bonus effects of all set parts <color=#4a70b9>1</color> time.

Desc: · On standby, Max HP <color=#4a70b9>+900</color> per second, up to <color=#4a70b9>9000</color>.
SimpleEffectDesc: · On standby, increases the bearer's Max HP over time.

Desc: · Grants double Missile Support with DMG multiplier increased to <color=#4a70b9>1777%</color>.\n· Missile Support has a <color=#4a70b9>77%</color> chance to increase DMG multiplier to <color=#4a70b9>7777%</color>.
SimpleEffectDesc: · Missile Support boost!\n· Chance for Missile Support to gain a super boost!!!
